It has notified the revised rate of Service tax from 12.36% to flat 14% (Subsuming Education Cess and Secondary & Higher Secondary Education Cess) to be effective from June 1 2015. 2. AIl   Division of NHAI are requested to modify their  tender  documents/take the necessary actions while hosting tenders at e-tendering portal of NHAI. It is to be mentioned here that registration fee for bidders using tender portal is Rs. 2000/- plus service tax. All Tender Inviting Authorities should take the new tax into account for the tenders t0 be uploaded after 1 June 2015. 3, For any kind of e-tender assistance , MIs C1 India Pvt. Ltd._ the e-tendering service provider to NHAI has established dedicated  helpdesk center at Training Room , Ground Floor, NHAI, Dwarka. 4. This issues with the approval of competent authority.
